vulnerabilities: External Control of File Name or Path
Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
Improper Control of Resource Identifiers ('Resource Injection')
description: The function is vulnerable to path traversal attacks (CWE-22) because it uses user-supplied input to construct a file path without properly validating or sanitizing the input. This could allow an attacker to access, modify, or delete files outside of the intended directory. The function is also vulnerable to external control of file name or path (CWE-73) because it uses user-supplied input in the 'url' parameter to determine the destination file path.
